Control Name: 2.1.1 Development and operations processes are connected to a Service Management framework like ISO or ITIL
Control Statement: ITIL is a set of detailed IT service management (ITSM) practices that can complement DevOps by providing support for products and services built and deployed using DevOps practices.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.1 Have you identified and planned out the roles and responsibilities to ensure your workload follows operational excellence best practices?
control_attributes.Control: 2.1.1 Development and operations processes are connected to a Service Management framework like ISO or ITIL
control_attributes.Description: ITIL is a set of detailed IT service management (ITSM) practices that can complement DevOps by providing support for products and services built and deployed using DevOps practices.
